name: Galaxy Race
description: Do you think that you have seen everything when it comes to virtual reality games? Check out the revolutionary technology of Galaxy Race and enter the world of galalactic fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-6400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 / RX 480 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel i7-7700 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
